local_intent: Compute a top grasp pose for white_box after alignment and verify goal_pose is available.
assumptions: white_box is detectable within short timeout
Alignment can be achieved with 0.01 tolerance prior to pose computation
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around ComputeGraspPose: detect target, align, compute top grasp pose to result_key=goal_pose, then verify availability.
